This files verifies that the dataset can be loaded and creates a copy of it in the data folder (the \_raw should be left alone not touched by anyone).

```{r}
suppressMessages({
  library('tidyverse')
})
```

```{r}
# verify that the dataset can be loaded successfully
data_path <- "../_raw/abundance.csv"
dataset <- read_csv(data_path, show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# show a couple of rows from the dataset
head(dataset)
```

```{r}
# save the dataset in the data fodler
write_tsv(dataset, "../data/02_dat_load.tsv")
```
